channel.title: Astronomical event of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the astronomical event of the day.

item.title: List of lunar eclipses in the 21st century
item.description: There will be 230 lunar eclipses in the 21st century (2001â€“2100): 87 penumbral, 58 partial and 85 total. Eclipses are listed in sets by lunar years, repeating every 12 months for each node. Ascending node eclipses are given a red background highlight. See also: List of lunar eclipses, List of 20th-century lunar eclipses, and List of 22nd-century lunar eclipses.
